Caption: Dr. P. Subbarayan (Union Minister of Transport and Communications) shakes hands with a student
Description: The Chief Guest, Dr. P. Subbarayan (Union Minister of Transport and Communication) distributed a number of prizes to students and faculty members at the Third Institute Day. The Institute Day of IIT Madras is a day marked to celebrate the hard work and success of certain people who have shown excellence in academics as well as extracurricular activities. In the image, Dr. P. Subbarayan shakes hands with a student as he approaches the dais to receive his prize. Also seen in the image is Mr. V. Siddhartha (standing next in line to receive his prize). Identification by Mr. K. Narayanan, Mr. C. V. Sahasranamam and Mr. Anand Singh Bawa.
